column2: "/ci2 1 Ah! Can you help me out here? There's a lot of enemies."
"/ci9 1 Thanks for the help! I owe you one!"
"/ci5 3 I'm sorry... I'm going to head back for now."
"/ci2 1 Ah! Can you help me out here?"
"/ci9 1 Thanks for the help! I owe you one!"
"/ci5 3 I'm sorry... I'm going to head back for now."

"/ci2 1 あっ！\u3000キミ、いいところに！_a
ちょっと手伝ってもらえないかな？"

"/ci9 1 いきなりごめんね。助かったよ。
ありがとう。_b"
"/ci4 3 I'm sorry... You should get out of here too if things get worse."
"/ci2 1 Ah! Thank goodness! Can you help me out here?"
"/ci9 1 Sorry for springing that on you. Thanks for the help."
"/ci5 3 I'm sorry... You should get out of here too if things get worse."

"/ci2 1 あっ！\u3000キミ、いいところに！
ちょっと手伝ってもらえないかな？_a"

"/ci9 1 いきなりごめんね。助かったよ。
ありがとう。_b"
